title: Policy mix to stimulate investment in P&E

content.prompt: To stimulate investment in new plant and equipment without increasing the level of real output, the best policy mix is to

choices.label: increase administered interest rates and increase government spending
decrease administered interest rates and decrease government spending
increase administered interest rates and increase income taxes
decrease administered interest rates and decrease income taxes
decrease income taxes and increase government spending
